:::Child would have slaped his head if this arm had not been froven in the 
tree, only his head poked out:::

Child: "I nearly forgot! Gigatron! You of all will see me most, for you have 
a gift that not even My father has, not even defection has it, It is the gift 
af un movable loyalty. not once have you questioned what anyone has told you 
to do, you just did it. For these things there are rewards. You may not be 
part og my family, but you are part of my sole, and hence forth I shall give 
you a gift. The gift to speak with me, wenever you need gidence. Just close 
your eyes and think of me, and i shall be with you! My love to all things!!" 

:::He shouted these last words, and the skys began to darken...:::

--part1_90.d6084b3.27683bb0_boundary
